scripts.oss:cli: ossutil cp -rf --meta Cache-Control:no-cache build oss://zhangkaiyu-dev/ && ossutil cp -rf --meta Cache-Control:max-age=31536000 build/static oss://zhangkaiyu-dev/static
scripts.oss:rclone: rclone copy --exclude 'static/**' --header 'Cache-Control: no-cache' build alioss:/zhangkaiyu-dev --progress && rclone copy --header 'Cache-Control: max-age=31536000' build/static alioss:/zhangkaiyu-dev/static --progress
